1.3.0 (2014-01-30 UTC)

- Use the same exit code as pass if it fails
- Use timeout instead of background-sleep-kill
- Use tmpfile instead of piping image into viewer via stdin
  - This allows for much greater flexibility in choice of viewer
  - Update config file with examples for compatible viewers.


1.2.0 (2014-01-30 UTC)

- Reverse some feature creep
  - Remove trace output and -v, --verbose option
  - Remove -c, --config option - only read predefined config files
  - Don't look for a default viewer if none is configured
- Remove dependency on ImageMagick
- Add /etc/passqr.conf with example configurations
- Minor improvements to help text


1.1.0 (2014-01-28 UTC)

- Add config file support
  - Command line options have precedence
- Add more command line options
  - -c, --config FILE
  - -h, --help
  - -m, --multiline
  - -s, --dotsize
  - -w, --viewer 'COMMAND'
- Add proper bash completion
- Add some output to verbose mode
- Attempt to find viewer automatically if none is set
- Exit immediately if no pass-name is given
- Greatly improve usage message
- Clean up makefile, add uninstall target
